posts.post_content:

Back up and still looking!  Thanks to Luke for the reply.

Back at it after a bit of a hiatus.  Anyone have any of the tougher backs of Mr. Lavender?

Looking for a 1-2.5, raw or graded.  I have Piedmont, Sweet Cap, Polar Bear, Sovereign, and EPDG.  I also have a Broadleaf incoming.  Looking for anything else I don't have.

Thanks!

[quote name="jrlebert" post=1655509]I also have a Broadleaf incoming.[/QUOTE]

I'm jealous.  That's a tough one.  I figure my Lavender run will likely never include that one, the Carolina Brights, or Drum.

Yeah, it didn't come cheap, but if I am doing the run, I would need it eventually... 

Anyone?
Still looking for Lavenders I do not have. Anyone?
I think I have a t-215 Red Cross tobacco lavender.  Low grade though.  Not sure what it’s worth.
